posts.post_content: Trade Rare 4 1/2 x 7 inch Calendar Topp SGC Authentic Detroit Bush,Jennings, Wild Bill Donovan.    Wanted —— Old Judge. Lady Baldwin, Pete Conway, Deacon White, Getzein, Goodfellow, any pose. John McGlone 311-1, George Rooks 391-1, Bobby Wheelock 493-1, Barney Gilligan 189-1, 189-2, Kid Baldwin error 16.6. Joe. No idea why photos arrive upside down.
